item.title: Active Learning Demo
item.description: Active Learning on Molecular Systems with GraphDot, xTB, ASE, and scikit-learn Original Post: 3/11/2020 Updated: 4/10/2020 Introduction Since the end of my PhD (Aug 2019), I have been interested in combining active learning with quantum calculations to explore configuration space in molecular systems. The goal of this post is to explore active learning on a simple system and to put a few ideas out there for people to think about and expand on.
